Description:
Modern Lifestyle by the Sea
Move to the coast and enjoy all what the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer, sit back and relax from the living area and decked alfresco enjoying the water views across Corio Bay.
With multiple beaches only 1km to Ocean Grove only 14km away. Beachside living at its best, with four double bedrooms, three living zones, two bathrooms and all amenities only minutes away, the beautiful Geelong City Centre only 17km.
With a wide entrance at the front there is a large study or third living room with leads to the master ensuite with twin vanity, modern shower with adjustable rail, tiled niche, and tiled show base.
At the heart of the home is the spacious open plan living spaces, kitchen with 900mm oven/cooktop and dishwasher, stone benchtops, glass splashback, huge double fridge/freezer space with water point, large pantry and an abundance of storage.
Highlights include:
Ducted heating and ducted cooling for the entire house
Huge alfresco and decked backyard
Wide frontage with two driveways, perfect to store a caravan or boat, plus double gate to the rear yard.
Double lock up garage with rear roller door to concreted area
Elevated North facing rear yard to enjoy the amazing views across Corio Bay.
Outdoor shower
Insights: 42 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A RARE OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS!
A rare opportunity has presented itself for those looking to downsize their home but still enjoy the benefits of approx 585 m2 parcel of land in the coastal town of Clifton Springs. Features of the home include ducted heating, split system air conditioning for year round comfort and 2 bedrooms with a central bathroom/en-suite to both! The expansive open plan living, dining and kitchen area enjoy duel access to both the rear yard and side access to the house large enough for a car if a little tweaking was done. Positioned within walking distance to both the Golf Club and Clifton Springs waterfront, this really is the ideal choice for those looking to downsize without having to compromise on space and privacy. Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Coastal, Chic & Contemporary
Completely renovated throughout, this modern delight has left no stone unturned and allows for you to move right in, with nothing to do but sit back and enjoy!
Raked timber ceilings and inviting hardwood timber floors sets the scene for this light and bright abode. The practical and spacious kitchen offers SS appliances and an abundance of storage, while overlooking the dining and lounge. 3 sundrenched bedrooms all with built-in-robes sit from the central hallway and are serviced by the family bathroom with shower, bath and vanity, separate toilet and all complete with a clever European laundry.
Sliding doors from the dining space gives access to the undercover deck and pergola, which flows onto a lush grass area, surrounded by mature and established foliage.
Additional features include heating and cooling, new window furnishings and light fittings, subtle Bay views, garden shed, double carport set upon a generous 585m2 parcel.
A sublime first home, ideal investment or perfect for those downsizing who don't want to compromise on space, this home will exceed your expectations. With public transport, shops and the Bay at your fingertips, flanked for choice when it comes to amenities including schools, cafes and the Geelong CBD only a 20-minute drive away, this is the perfect lifestyle choice!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
DELIGHTFUL HOME WITH MODERN APPEAL
This wonderful home has been updated with modern appeal and is positioned in a court location with adjacent laneway access to Jetty Rd. The home enjoys both space and privacy on approx 755m2 and is situated in close proximity to the Clifton Springs boat ramp, bowls and golf clubs & the pristine swimming beach at The Dell. Well maintained and featuring 3 bedrooms including master with ensuite, a functional kitchen with adjoining dining & sitting room that flow out to an undercover entertaining area and a spacious separate lounge overlooking the lush front garden. The generous rear yard is ideal for those needing extra space. The home further enjoys a split system, ceiling fans, quality blinds and represents a fantastic opportunity with investment potential or a fabulous place to call home!

Description:
Breathtaking Water Views
This striking residence is beautifully positioned to embrace the ultimate 'sea change' lifestyle; commanding panoramic water views, a short stroll to the water's edge, the highly regarded boat launch literally just down the road and the Clifton Springs Golf Course only a 5 iron from your front door. A stylish renovation showcases light filled living zones of grand proportions and all the modern comforts one could wish for! A genuine one of a kind and a truly exclusive offering!
4 bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. All 3 additional bedrooms have built in robes
The primary living zone of this home is a fine example of 'reverse living' to optimise spectacular panoramic vistas; sweeping water views through the towering tree tops and the impressive granite peaks of the You Yangs. A trio of glass sliding doors lead out onto the wrap around deck and promote an abundance of natural light.
The kitchen is beautifully appointed; expansive bench tops, custom cabinetry, excellent storage solutions and Smeg appliances.
A 2nd independent living zone provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan.
The prime landing of approximately 613m² is enviably placed right within the blue chip Golf Course precinct.
All the modern comforts and a stylish renovation provide a wonderful buying opportunity
The Bellarine Peninsula offers a wonderful seaside lifestyle; award winning wineries, vibrant restaurant and café scene and so many more wonderful features to be discovered.

Description:
Make It Yours!
Here is a wonderful opportunity to purchase the site for your new home, wonderfully close to Clifton Springs Primary School, making it ideal for raising your children. If they want to play tennis or skate we have the playground close by as well. The boat ramp and golf course are within 1 km of this block, giving you a wealth of leisure time opportunities at your doorstep. This block is flat, with a slight elevation at the front. Offering limited water views in the distance, here is the perfect opportunity to build (STCA) your dream family home.
Terms: 10% Deposit. Settlement 60 Days Or Sooner By Agreement.
Text 20carapooka to 0472 880 610 for further details.

Address: 51 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Opulent Golf Course Frontage
Offering total peace and tranquility, this magnificent home captures the beautiful Clifton Springs water views and is perfectly set up for Golf on the weekends and the complete lifestyle balance.
With water view from the front and expansive yard to the rear - inspection is certain to inspire and impress.
This three bedroom family residence offers superior comfort and is elegantly themed, featuring an open plan kitchen/meals/family/living zone boasting expansive views and large windows that create light filled rooms.
The kitchen is the true centrepiece of the home. With dropped feature ceiling, an oversized island bench and a feature 5 drop pendant light above. The induction cooktop, dishwasher and large built in pantry will ensure that you love using this space.
There are also three large bedrooms, all have built in robes. The second toilet in the laundry is a convenient addition.
There are dual driveways on either side of the property. On the ground floor there is a drive in man cave (with remote controlled roller door) or separate family rumpus room with easy access to the expansive back yard with a good sized garden shed.
Welcome extras include home security and alarm system, evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating, full frontage balcony and established gardens.
This standout property is central to all the lifestyle and amenities from the heart of Clifton Springs. This property is about life's moments. Walk across the road for a game of golf or a lovely dinner for two at Clifton Springs Golf club. Utilise the bowls club just down the road or simply enjoy the ambience along the waterfront.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.
Internal area
17m²

Description:
Buy For the View
Loved family home on the market for the first time in over 30 years. Dual access with front & back steps lead you up to the elevated living offering bay views that will never be built out. Open plan light filled living features panoramic views of the bay showcasing Avalon, You Yangs & Geelong watching ships cruise through the channel. Lounge is tiled & has a reverse cycle split system. Kitchen has plenty of cupboards & an electric stove. Sliding doors out to study with built in desk. Split level leads you to the Master bedroom that has carpet, 4 built in robes & sliding doors out to the balcony. Bedroom 2 has carpet, 2 built in robes. Bed 3 is smaller & tiled with sliding doors out to the balcony, versatile as a either sitting room or kids play zone. Also here is the central bathroom servicing all rooms. Excellent use of under the house! Here you will find a huge 2nd living area perfect for a teenager, 4th bedroom, entertainment room or even a holiday let. Also here is a separate toilet and a laundry complete with a shower & double linen. Plus, a storage room for beach gear or bikes. The backyard offers low maintenance gardens, neighbor be gone hedges, side gate direct to the double carport, a double car lock up garage, off street parking for 2 cars & low maintenance gardens with more side gates. All on a 580m2 block just waiting for the new owner. All amenities you could need including local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport & medical facilities. Plus, everything the Bellarine lifestyle has to offer such as the bay, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services & wineries just to mention a few.

Description:
POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS!
An amazing opportunity with endless possibilities ranging from an addition to the portfolio, an extension and renovation with a beautiful northerly aspect, a subdivision and development (STCA) or a first home with all of these options in the future. This home sits on a corner allotment of approx 602m2 and enjoys open plan living from the kitchen meals and lounge area flowing onto the a large rear north facing yard together with 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, gas heating and 2 car accommodation. Positioned in close proximity to the recently upgraded boat ramp, within walking distance to the swimming beach at The Dell and one of the Bellarines best golf courses, Clifton Springs Golf Club where you can enjoy northerly views over Corio Bay & Port Phillip Bay to the You Yangs whilst playing the 18 hole course.
This is an opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Entry Level Buying with Sweeping Bay Views!
Bayside charm meets coastal chic - this completely renovated home is a sheer delight and all within a 5 minute stroll to the water's edge.
Positioned perfectly within an enviable, elevated pocket of Clifton Springs, this is a rare opportunity to secure entry level buying, with million-dollar views!
Oozing neutral, earthy tones throughout, you're welcomed by a spacious open plan living, dining and fully equipped kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher, ample storage and marble look benchtops, with this whole area encompassing tranquil Bay views. 3 generous sized bedrooms all sit from the rear hallway, with the master comprising access to the outdoor deck - a tranquil retreat indeed, overlooking the Bay and Beacon Point Reserve! A central family bathroom offers a combined bath and shower, vanity and floor to ceiling tiles, with the laundry hosting an additional shower.
The backyard offers an open deck and grassed area, ready for you to add your creative touches.
Additional features include - Stainless steel appliances, ducted heating, central cooling, single car port, garden shed.
Beacon Point Reserve, the Bay and public transport are quite literally on your doorstep, with all major amenities and the remainder of the Bellarine only minutes away. This is a lifestyle choice that you will not regret, whether you're looking for your first home, next investment or holiday home.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Character, Charm & Only Minutes to the Bay!
Perfectly located in a sought after and elevated pocket of Clifton Springs, this quaint abode will delight.
Storybook charm, as you're welcomed by a full length, undercover verandah, with warming timber floorboards and stunning raked ceilings upon entry. The open plan lounge offers soaring feature windows with Bay glimpses and with Winter now upon us, the cosy fireplace radiates warmth throughout the entire home. The fully renovated kitchen with SS appliances overlooks the dining, which effortlessly flows into an optional 2nd living/dining. The master retreat sits at the rear, with WIR and renovated full en-suite. The remaining 2 bedrooms host BIR's and serviced by the family bathroom, with a separate toilet and laundry completing this functional family home.
A paved decked area for effortless outdoor entertaining, coupled with a large open grassed space with room for the kids to run amuck - a wealth of options are on offer.
Additional features include - double carport, manicured gardens front and back, garden shed, secure gates to the backyard, heating, cooling, and feature ceiling fans.
Public transport, schools and all major amenities are on your doorstep, with the rest of the booming Bellarine only moments away, secure your slice of paradise today!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
High On The Hill
Perfectly positioned high on the block with brilliant views of the water towards Geelong and the You Yangs, 5 Gumarooka Avenue is an awesome property and a perfect addition to your property portfolio or first home. Comprising 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, formal lounge with views from all windows, open plan kitchen family room, 2 air conditioning units, Solar electricity to keep bills down and a rear yard perfect for the veggie patch. A property with features including northerly sun flowing into in the living areas, unobstructed views of the water & a high setting on the hill will attract a lot of attention, so be quick to book your inspection today!!

Description:
NEAT, SWEET and COMPLETE!
Perfect entry level home on 605m2. Surrounded by established houses in a quiet tree-lined street in Clifton Springs within close proximity to shopping, schooling and boating facilities.
Immaculately presented inside and out ! Painting done, flooring done, kitchen done and bathroom done !!! First home buyers or retirees alike will fall in love with this quaint home. The interior living spaces are flooded with northern light and your modern kitchen looks out to manicured garden beds. Two bedrooms with BIRs and the third bedroom could double as a study or home office. The tastefully, renovated bathroom has a large bath, over-sized shower and euro washing space.
Features include 900ss oven, dw, LED downlights, stained timber bench tops, bedroom ceiling fans, feature mantel and modern square - cut cornices.
Plenty of yard space for vehicles or a boat. To the rear of the property the double colorbond garage has concrete flooring and ample yard space for the children to play.
Inspection a must !

Description:
A Dream Block, Ready and Waiting For Your Dream Home!
Often sought, yet rarely found, this is your unique opportunity to secure an elevated block in a desired and private pocket of Clifton Springs.
Boasting a 584m2 (approx.) allotment with a 15m frontage and encompassing views of the Bay and beyond that need to be appreciated in real life to truly believe. Due to the elevated positioned, the views can be enjoyed whether your dream home consists of a single level build or that lavish 2 storey design - let your imagination run wild!
A bonus for this parcel, is that it's already equipped with a perfectly positioned, 9.2 x 6m garage at the rear and complete with a water tank and planter boxes.
A 5-minute stroll has you tipping your toes in the Bay, with access to a tucked away and sheltered beach for safe, family swimming and all major amenities including public transport, shops and schools at your fingertips. With the Bellarine Peninsula's market going from strength to strength, this prime and unique allotment will not last long!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
WALK THE PARKLANDS TO THE BEACH.......FABULOUS POSITION!
No. 86 is situated in a leafy and private area (approx. 635 SQM) with walkways to the bay, a real haven for the astute buyer. A solid build comprising of tiled entrance through to a spacious formal lounge room, a second open plan space with solid timber kitchen, meals and living overlooking the rear garden. Three bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, other two have BIR'S, central bathroom with spa, separate toilet and laundry. Features include gas heating and air conditioning, fireplace, double pantry, dishwasher, split system, new fences and more. Double garage has been partly converted for office, maybe bungalow. A gem of a property with bush appeal, yet minutes from the water.

Description:
Bay Beach Living
Happiness hits as you are impressed by manicured gardens, exposed aggregate driveway, downstairs deck/veranda and the large sandstone bricks. Stepping inside finds you in the first living area with its own reverse cycle split system. Moving on to the left you will find the master bedroom with ceiling fan, built in robes plus a walk in robe alongside the stylish en-suite with Caesar stone benches, plenty of storage & huge shower. Another door takes you to a vast undercover alfresco that makes entertaining all year around a breeze in this zone with built in seating, a bar plus an outdoor kitchen with a double sink, plenty of cupboards & a great fridge cavity. Heading up the stairs to the second storey is a landing perfect for a study nook or display area with a tucked away double linen closet. Open plan elevated living is light filled with large windows to maximize views of the bay & Geelong that make this home something special to savor. This living sector has a reverse cycle split system & a wood heater to enjoy cozy winters watching storms sweep across the bay. A sliding door takes you outside to the decked undercover upstairs area perfect to enjoy a cheese platter or a cheeky wine with family & friends. Attractive kitchen features stainless steel appliances including electric oven, grill, 4 burner gas cook top, range hood & dish washer all overlooking the dining area. Bedroom 2 has 3 BIR's, ceiling fan & access to the classy 2 way bathroom again with Caesar stone benches, extra storage & large shower. Central laundry has convenient stairs for direct access to the backyard, chic timber back boards & overhead cupboards. Bedroom 3 has 2 BIR's & ceiling fan. Out the back is manicured hedge lined gardens, fire pit area, planter boxes perfect to grow vegetables & a barn style storage shed. All sitting pretty on a 585m2 block which backs onto a reserve. Close to local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport, medical facilities & everything the Bellarine has to offer such as the bay, beaches, ferry services and wineries just to mention a few. So much bang for your buck you best be sure to have this on your future home shopping list.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
READY FOR YOUR STAMP
"State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 20 people, social distancing still applies"
In real estate we often use words like "blank canvas" "ready for your own personal stamp" Well this property is exactly that. The paint is hardly dry and the smell of new carpet hits your nostrils as you walk inside but the rest of the home needs finishing off. Move in and take your time. A neat compact but not pokey home which comprises three bedrooms, one bathroom and single garage. On a corner site which often appeals to the boat or caravan owner to have side access.
This home would suit someone buying into the market for their first home, an investor or a downsizer who likes the idea of a smaller home and a garden to play in. The outside truly is a blank canvas. Veggie patches, flowers, trees or bushes all totally up to you.
Why not come along and take a look? Clifton springs is a suburb of choice because of its affordability and the lifestyle it offers. Walking, riding, fishing, golfing, eating and drinking are all right here.

Address: 90 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
AVANT-GARDE Cutting Edge Splendour
An architectural delight by Charles Maccora showcasing an exemplary display of quality craftsmanship, chic fittings, fixtures, and overall attention to detail.
If bespoke is what you seek, something truly special that is adorned with luxe features and complemented with stunning views, perhaps, this one of a kind abode may be the one for you.
This home screams "distinct" from the moment you lay eyes on it. The peculiarity of such a creation is certainly not typical of this location however, the contemporary fusion of luxury and comfort complete with Bay views gives you the ideal retreat.
Now, in terms of what we have on offer lets begin with the simplistic free flowing floor plan that has been designed with practicality and in such a way where all the space is utilised in an astute manner. A low maintenance manicured front entry through a grand timber door will set the theme for what comes next! The ground floor boasts impressive custom Messmate timber floors that follow throughout the home, a brilliant home office equipped with walk-in library, inbuilt desk with access to the back garden. 2 generous sized bedrooms both equipped with custom designed built-in- robes, ceiling fans and sliding door access onto the deck. Main bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, free standing bath, seamless tiled shower including niche box and rainfall shower head, stone vanity, WC, fantastic storage complete with Phoenix black tapware. A generous sized laundry with inbuilt custom cabinetry and access to the garden. The ground level is well equipped with an abundance of storage cupboards and cleverly completed with censor lights in the hallway and staircase.
The floating timber staircase effortlessly leads you up to the heart of the home which is certainly the WOW factor. A sensational open plan light filled area is not only practical but fantastic for entertaining in style. The galley style kitchen overlooking the dining and living is set to impress, lavish 60mm Caesarstone benchtop with power outlets and double in bench ceramic sink equipped with Zip tap instant boiling water and filtered cold water function complete with Bosch dishwasher, electric oven and 5 burner cooktop. The spacious lounge enjoys a stone stack mantel with gas feature fire and sophisticated aluminum stacker doors which open to the balcony and panoramic views. The master suite is pure luxury with an entirely decked out walk-in-robe, private balcony access and a retreat style ensuite with double shower including twin shower heads, free standing bath, custom skylight, WC and storage. The first floor is complete with a handy 4th bedroom.
Low maintenance gardens front and back with garden shed and 3000L water tank, deck, and alfresco area.
Features of this home include ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, ceiling fans, feature gas fire, custom lighting, quality window furnishings, lockable sliders including screen doors throughout, Blackbutt exterior decking, Messmate custom floors, feature tiles, double glazed and tinted windows and double lock up garage with remote/internal/external access and additional workshop.
No expense has been spared for this Clifton Springs masterpiece offering practicality, convenience, comfort, luxury, Bay views, lifestyle, flanked for amenities including proximity to the Bay, golf course, shops and schools all at such an affordable price point. An inspection is a must to understand what is on offer.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Ultimate family home on enormous block
Set on a huge 1153 sqm (approx.) block, this well-presented brick home has undergone quality renovations, and boasts a bright interior with Tasmanian Oak flooring, modern kitchen with extras, and two spacious, inviting living zones. The double carport, extensive driveway and enormous rear lock-up garage provide multiple options for storing vehicles and/or toys or tools. Offering an abundance of space, and located close to schools and sporting facilities, this is the ultimate family home you've been searching for.
The master bedroom offers a generous WIR with in-built shelving and drawers, and roomy ensuite with oversized shower, grey-marbled floor tiles and dual vanity. All bedrooms have plush grey carpets and cabinetry with in-built drawers, and are serviced by the home's main bathroom with family bath, shower, vanity and separate WC. The laundry has ample storage and direct external access.
Floor-to-ceiling cabinetry, grey stone benchtops and 900mm Smeg appliances feature in the high-quality, recently-renovated kitchen. No expense has been spared, with extras including USB power points, zoned overhead LED lighting, and an abundance of soft-close cupboards and drawers with handy concealed powerpoints inside each pantry.
Entertain family and friends on the undercover, wrap-around paved alfresco area overlooking the rear yard with its vast expanse of lawn bordered by established greenery. An elevated cubby with slide offers the perfect hideaway for the kids. The impressive industrial-sized lock-up garage with roller door access and lean-to, has heavy-duty wiring with a 15 Amp outlet, and low-maintenance garden beds comprise the remainder of the yard. Call Charles to arrange an inspection ASAP.
- Huge block, with vast rear lawn and cubby house for the kids
- Extensive high-quality renovations with lots of extras
- Large industrial garage provides plenty of storage for vehicles/boats/caravans
- Two living zones allow plenty of room for the family to spread out
- 3 split systems & gas ducted heating ensure year-round comfort
- Located close to schools, reserves and sporting facilities
* Fletchers Coronavirus Update *
In light of recent events, Fletchers have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
- You are feeling unwell
- Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
- Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
- You are under strict self-isolation instructions
- You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
- Our agents may restrict number of people inspecting the property at any one time
- You refrain from touching surfaces, doorhandles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Tranquil Oasis!
Admire the private position and exclusive style of this single-level villa, set well back from the street and tailor made for easy enjoyment. 2/9 Gaddang Court is a great opportunity to buy into the booming Clifton Springs property market.
This secluded oasis, is a beautifully presented blank canvas with its house-like feel and proportions with low maintenance gardens ensuring that it represents a brilliant down-size option with outstanding lock and leave credentials.
Upon entering the home you are greeted with a property that is well-designed and features a spacious feel and distinction. The stunning kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a generous bench, which leads to the impressively stylish and spacious lounge/dining area. Boasting 3 generous bedrooms, 2 with generous built in robes and the master bedroom offering a welcome hint of indulgence with an ensuite and walk-in robe.
To further compliment the home it's located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for. Only a short stroll to public transport, access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this superb location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.
